data.name: Techpowerup Dark
data.description:
Dark themed Techpowerup.com, forum is excluded.
Further improvement such as changing font type, font color and background color will be added in the future.
data.css:
@-moz-document regexp("https:\\/\\/(www.techpowerup.com)\\/(?!forums).*") {
.frontpagepoll,
.clearfix,
.cardimage,
li,
#quicksearch,
#input,
.vgabios .content .search>div,
.downloads .content .latest>div,
.downloads .content>.dl-left>nav>.tree-wrap,
.staff-member:nth-child(2n+1),
.reviewlist-search>div,
.cpudb .content .search>div,
.cpudb-details .content>.specs-large>div,
.cpudb-details .content .unreleased,
.downloads .content .sort-options,
.gallery-index .addcase-button
{
    background:none!important
}
body,
td,
th,
select,
.pager a,
.flickity-slider,
.frontpagepoll h2,
#page,
#menu,
.sidebar,
footer,
.downloads .content>.dl-left>nav ul.dltree li>a.selected,
.comments .posttext blockquote
{
    background:#212121!important;
}
b,
p,
div,
td,
th,
select,
.pager a,
.clearfix,
#page,
#menu,
#quicksearch,
.sidebar,
footer,
.sidebar-newposts__time,
.reviewlist-search>div,
.reviewlist-search #filtertable>.award>ul>li>label,
label
{
    color:rgb(255, 255, 255)!important;
}
a,a:visited,a:hover,span,#menu,
h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,h7
{
    color:#cf9331!important
}
}

Original: https://userstyles.org/styles/173373/tweetdeck-pink-theme

data.name: Facebook Dark Material Customized Gradient Colors
data.description:
YOU CHOOSE YOUR COLORS (with gradient) in [Customize Settings].

REMOVE RIGHT SIDE ADS (People you may know, Ads,...).

Give the best UX/UI.
Modified version from previous Facebook Dark Theme in stylish. 

Install Minimal Scrollbar Chrome Extension for best experience.
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/minimal-scrollbar/ekopmclclddpoipchmcbhifohhbmjafd?hl=vi

data.name: Wanikani: Hide Remaining Count In Lesson Session
data.description: Hides the progress bar and the remaining counts during a lesson quiz

data.name: MALgraph Dark *Active*
data.description:
**ATTENTION** Please install Stylus due to Stylish plugin violating ToS by recording URLs you visit. This is basically the same code but with the mining code removed. URL - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne

NOTE: This is for the new site since the old MALgraph is shutting down. http://graph.anime.sc/
There are no other options for MAL themes, so, I made this one have options. Add your own background image and change the colors to your desire.

data.name: SFU MyExperience Revamp
data.description:
A revamp of the "Job Postings" board on MyExperience. All relevant information is now fully visible on 1 screen! Job Title column is larger, other less relevant columns are now smaller. Text never goes off screen.

Feel free to msg hewwitt#3228 on Discord if you wanna add onto it or have questions or whatever.
